name: The Window Box
description: The Window Box is a surreal dark comedy visual novel about a group of friends trapped in a house during a freak storm. Wander from room to room as a fly on the wall, while helping the women confront the conflict in their lives. For what is a house but a box with windows?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 2 GB available space
